title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and garnish with parsley.
